title: Rahu Transit in the 10th House for Scorpio Ascendant
summary: When Rahu transits the 10th house for Scorpio Ascendant, ambition, visibility, and career drive intensify sharply. This phase brings a strong hunger for recognition, authority, and public impact through unconventional paths. Sudden opportunities, foreign influence, or rapid status shifts are possible. However, shortcuts, ethical compromises, or image obsession can backfire. Reputation becomes highly sensitive. When ambition is aligned with discipline and integrity, this transit delivers powerful professional elevation, mass visibility, and long-term authority through strategic action.

sections.title: Core Personality
points: Identity ties closely to career image

sections.title: Finance
points: Income linked to status and visibility

closing: This Rahu transit amplifies ambition and visibility. With integrity and discipline, it becomes a defining phase of career rise and authority.
